_header: It beth three times on that day / that sooth to witten me may

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Hit beoþ þreo times on þo dayÞat soþ to
                    witen me maiÞat on us þat ishal henneÞat oþer
                    þat ynot whenneÞat þridde is my moste careÞat ynot
                    whider ishal fare
